bibl.title: The New Comedy Prologue of Pap. Argentor. Gr. 53: Interpretation and Authorship.
bibl.note: Cf. résumé dans: Proceedings of the XIV International Congress of Papyrologists (London, 1975) pp. 73-77. - L'attribution à Ménandre est vraisemblable. - Le prologue serait celui des "Anepsioi".
bibl.seg: Dedoussi Christina, The New Comedy Prologue of Pap. Argentor. Gr. 53: Interpretation and Authorship.
